name: Draw Happy Beauty
description:
Have fun playing "Draw Happy Beauty" today!

Can you make beauty people happy??
They want to live a happy life,so need your brain!
Let's test your brain for playing the quick-drawing games

How to be Draw Master

Relax and solve puzzles with the pencil
Calm down and Find missing one part.
Please don't erase one part eather erase them,do put one scribble what is empty.

Spend long days and life with the puzzles.
Over 100 puzzles and so many episodes of missing parts make you fun.
Don't skip. Maybe you can be like braindead.

You don't have to draw perfect.
Enjoy just like scribbling on a chalkboard.
You need not feel guilty. Feel happy and amaze their life!

If you like ibis paint,skechpad,brainpop and happy glass, Draw Happy Beauty will also be one of your favorite choices.
Let's download now Draw Happy Beauty and draw something,solve drawing puzzles.
